name: Advanced Custom Data
author: DevUI

sections.description:
The Advanced Custom Data to display anywhere.

The plugin allows using

  1. Display data in content (post, page, …)
  2. Display data in field (Contact Form 7)
  3. Display data in field (Advanced Custom Fields)
  4. Display data some where you want
    …

Documentation
